verse.name: v1
verse.lines: In Your Name, there is hope when all seems lost. newline There is freedom in the power of the cross. newline Let the world see

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In Your Name, there is truth where logic fails newline Understanding that makes sense of our days newline You are worthy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hear the sound of all creation roar newline We're crying out as one for You are our God. newline Now show us the way of Your love newline And we will come running.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: All for Jesus' Name, Your love displayed newline We are alive in the mystery newline All for sinners' gain, Your life You gave newline We'll sing Your praise for eternity.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: In Your Name, there is mercy without end newline Overtaking us now time and again newline Let the world see

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: In Your Name, there is love that never fails newline And the promise that Your Word will prevail. newline You are worthy.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Hallelujah newline Hallelujah newline Hallelujah newline Great is Your Name, Great is Your Name.
